amendment.description: In lieu of titles I and II of House amendment 1 (or, if such amendment has not been agreed to, in lieu of the matter proposed to be inserted by the Senate amendment), insert the following: TITLE I--SUPPLEMENTAL APPROPRIATIONS FOR DEFENSE, INTERNATIONAL AFFAIRS, AND OTHER SECURITY-RELATED NEEDS. ***.

action.text: Amendment reported by the House Committee on Rules.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A002) Agreed to without objection.
